text: Bernd Riexinger (born 30 October 1955) is a German politician of the Left Party. He was named co-chairman of the party, together with Katja Kipping, on 2 June 2012. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Left Party Category:Politicians from Baden- WÃ¼rttemberg
title: Bernd Riexinger
